20110127140410.000|20110127140411.000|CC1|>> Reporter: GOOD MORNING, TONY 
20110127140411.000|20110127140413.000|CC1|AND LISA.                       
20110127140413.000|20110127140414.000|CC1|GOOD MORNING, EVERYONE.         
20110127140414.000|20110127140415.000|CC1|INDEED SOME VERY DRAMATIC       
20110127140415.000|20110127140415.000|CC1|RESCUE                          
20110127140415.000|20110127140416.000|CC1|WORK TAKING PLACE IN THE        
20110127140416.000|20110127140417.000|CC1|APARTMENT COMPLEX BEHIND ME.    
20110127140417.000|20110127140419.000|CC1|TWO CHILDREN'S LIVES ARE SAVED. 
20110127140419.000|20110127140420.000|CC1|THAT RESCUE WORK DONE BY        
20110127140420.000|20110127140422.000|CC1|FIREFIGHTERS AND BY NEIGHBORS.  
20110127140422.000|20110127140425.000|CC1|>> WENT TO THE TRASH CAN AND    
20110127140425.000|20110127140426.000|CC1|GRABBED THE VACUUM CLEANER OUT  
20110127140426.000|20110127140427.000|CC1|OF THE TRASH CAN, AND I THREW   
20110127140427.000|20110127140427.000|CC1|IT                              
20110127140427.000|20110127140429.000|CC1|INSIDE THE HOUSE TO OPEN UP,    
20110127140429.000|20110127140430.000|CC1|FOR                             
20110127140430.000|20110127140431.000|CC1|THE SMOKE TO COME OUT, AND THEN 
20110127140431.000|20110127140432.000|CC1|I GOT THE EXTINGUISHER AND      
20110127140432.000|20110127140433.000|CC1|THREW                           
20110127140433.000|20110127140434.000|CC1|IT INSIDE THE HOUSE AS WELL.    
20110127140434.000|20110127140436.000|CC1|AND THEN THESE TWO GENTLEMEN    
20110127140436.000|20110127140438.000|CC1|HERE JUMPED INTO THE HOUSE AND  
20110127140438.000|20110127140439.000|CC1|GRABBED THE TWO KIDS.           
20110127140439.000|20110127140439.000|CC1|>> THE CHILDREN WAS REALLY IN   
20110127140439.000|20110127140442.000|CC1|BAD SHAPE WHEN THEY CAME OUT.   
20110127140442.000|20110127140442.000|CC1|THEY HAD SMOKE COMBINED WITH    
20110127140442.000|20110127140445.000|CC1|THEIR MUCOUS COMING OUT OF      
20110127140445.000|20110127140445.000|CC1|THEIR                           
20110127140445.000|20110127140446.000|CC1|MOUTHS.                         
20110127140446.000|20110127140447.000|CC1|IT WAS A VERY BAD SCENE.        
20110127140447.000|20110127140449.000|CC1|>> I SAW THESE TWO GENTLEMEN    
20110127140449.000|20110127140451.000|CC1|BREAKING THE WINDOW, I JUMPED   
20110127140451.000|20110127140453.000|CC1|STRAIGHT THROUGH THE WINDOW AND 
20110127140453.000|20110127140455.000|CC1|GRABBED ONE OF THE BABIES FROM  
20110127140455.000|20110127140455.000|CC1|THE CRIB.                       
20110127140455.000|20110127140456.000|CC1|>> OUR FIREFIGHTERS THAT        
20110127140456.000|20110127140456.000|CC1|ARRIVED                         
20110127140456.000|20110127140457.000|CC1|ON SCENE INITIALLY WERE HANDED  
20110127140457.000|20110127140458.000|CC1|TWO LIFELESS CHILDREN, CHILDREN 
20110127140458.000|20110127140459.000|CC1|THAT HAD SUFFERED BURNS AND     
20110127140459.000|20110127140501.000|CC1|SMOKE INHALATION AND WERE NOT   
20110127140501.000|20110127140504.000|CC1|BREATHING ON THEIR OWN.         
20110127140504.000|20110127140504.000|CC1|>> Reporter: FIREFIGHTERS       
20110127140504.000|20110127140505.000|CC1|PERFORMED CPR ON BOTH CHILDREN,

20110127141538.000|20110127141539.000|CC1|BEEN

20110127141556.000|20110127141557.000|CC1|>> Reporter: INCLUDING

20110127144529.000|20110127144531.000|CC1|LARGE CELL LYMPHOMA OR ALCL.    
20110127144531.000|20110127144533.000|CC1|IS GENERALLY FORMS AROUND THE   
20110127144533.000|20110127144534.000|CC1|SHELL OF THE IMPLANT.           
20110127144534.000|20110127144536.000|CC1|SO FAR 60 CASES OF ALCL HAVE    
20110127144536.000|20110127144538.000|CC1|BEEN IDENTIFIED AMONG THE FIVE  
20110127144538.000|20110127144540.000|CC1|TO 10 MILLION WOMEN WITH        
20110127144540.000|20110127144541.000|CC1|IMPLANTS WORLDWIDE.             
20110127144541.000|20110127144542.000|CC1|THE FDA IS NOT RECOMMENDING     
20110127144542.000|20110127144545.000|CC1|WOMEN WITH IMPLANTS GET THEM    
20110127144545.000|20110127144547.000|CC1|REMOVED, IT JUST WANTS WOMEN
